meanings.definition: The quality or state of being piggish.
meanings.sent1: Her piggishnesses were evident in the way she devoured the entire cake.
meanings.sent2: The farm was filled with the piggishnesses of the animals happily rolling in the mud.
meanings.sent3: Despite his piggishnesses, he always shared his food with others.
meanings.sent4: The piggishnesses of the greedy businessman knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The piggishnesses of the child at the buffet amazed the onlookers.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of a pig.
meanings.sent1: The piggishnesses of the piglet were adorable as it snorted and played in the mud.
meanings.sent2: The farmer observed the piggishnesses of the sow as she rooted around for food.
meanings.sent3: The piggishnesses of the pig at the fair made everyone laugh with its antics.
meanings.sent4: Her messy room showed the piggishnesses of a teenager who didn't like cleaning up.
meanings.sent5: The piggishnesses of the pig in the story symbolized greed and selfishness.
